activities.description: 대표 제품의 생성 기간동안 토탈 건수

activities.name: get page
activities.description: 대표 제품의 생성 기간동안 토탈 건수

query.value: @concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL ',pipeline().parameters.date,' DAY)')
@concat('SELECT * FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable, ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -',pipeline().parameters.IncDate,' DAY)')

@concat('SELECT srd_id,
	sd_reviewid,
	case when site = ''[대상]마켓컬리_STORE'' then ''마켓컬리_STORE'' else  site end  as site,
	site_id,
	replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_title, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_title,
    replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(srd_content, ''\\'', ''＼''),char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as srd_content,
	srd_writer,
	srd_writetime,
	srd_rate,
	srd_crawl_time
	FROM ',
pipeline().parameters.SourceTable,
 ' WHERE DATE(', pipeline().parameters.IncCol, ') = DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY)')

@concat('SELECT sd_id,
 replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(sd_name,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as sd_name,
 sd_url,
 site,
 site_id,
 sd_itemid,
 sd_reviewid,
 sd_brand,
 sd_maker,
 sd_ingredients,
 replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(sd_volume,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as sd_volume,
 sd_category,
 sd_low_price,
 sd_review_cnt,
 sd_rate,
 sd_low_store,
 sd_store_cnt,
 sd_crawl_time
  FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)

@concat('SELECT sd_id,
 replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(sd_name,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as sd_name,
 sd_url,
 site,
 site_id,
 sd_itemid,
 sd_reviewid,
 sd_brand,
 sd_maker,
 sd_ingredients,
 replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(sd_volume,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'',''''), '','',''//CM//'') as sd_volume,
 sd_category,
 sd_low_price,
 sd_review_cnt,
 sd_rate,
 sd_low_store,
 sd_store_cnt,
 sd_crawl_time
  FROM ', pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)

text.value:
INSERT INTO cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq (type, row_id, qty, crt_dt, crt_user) 
VALUES (
  '@{pipeline().parameters.ServiceId}'
  , (SELECT NVL(MAX(row_id), 0) + 1 FROM cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq WHERE type = '@{pipeline().parameters.ServiceId}')
  , '@{variables('endIdx')}'
  , to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmddhhmiss')
, 'system'
);

activities.name: ORA GET CNT
activities.description: 저장된 값의 Total 값을 확인하기 위해 DB조

oracleReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT NVL(max(qty), 0) as total_cnt FROM cd_if.cd_fdsfty_seq WHERE type = ''', pipeline().parameters.ServiceId, ''' ORDER BY row_id DESC ')

activities.description: API의 총 건 수를 확인하기 위해 API 1회 호출.
